name: @beliantech/bt-components
description: UI components for Belian Tech products

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.common.js && npm run build-css
scripts.deploy-storybook: npm run build-storybook && npx firebase deploy
scripts.publish-npm: npm run build && wct --npm && npm publish dist --access public
scripts.build-css: npx tailwindcss build src/bt-utils.css -o dist/bt-utils-full.css && npm run purge-css
scripts.purge-css: npx purgecss --css dist/bt-utils-full.css --content src/**/*.js src/components/**/*.js -s w-1/12 w-2/12 w-3/12 w-4/12 w-5/12 w-6/12 w-7/12 w-8/12 w-9/12 w-10/12 w-11/12 w-12/12 -o dist/bt-utils.css && rm dist/bt-utils-full.css

author: Jonathan Lin
